com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.services

Interface FileManagerAware

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractExpiringFileRepository, AbstractFileRepository, AmazonS3FileRepository, AwsS3FileRepository, AzureFileRepository, CachingFileRepository, ExpiringFileRepository, LocalFileRepository, SpringIntegrationFtpFileRepository, SpringIntegrationSftpFileRepository

    public interface FileManagerAware
    Interface that can be implemented by a FileRepository. The setFileManager(FileManager) will be called when the repository is attached to the FileManager. The shutdown() method will then be called when the file manager is being destroyed.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setFileManager(FileManager fileManager)
      Set the FileManager to which the repository is being attached.
      default void shutdown()
      Called when the file manager is being destroyed.

        Set the FileManager to which the repository is being attached.

      • shutdown

        default void shutdown()
        Called when the file manager is being destroyed.
